001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Objects;
006import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock;
007import java.util.function.Function;
008
009import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.NonNull;
010import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogAppender.AbstractLogAppender;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogAppender.ThreadSafeLogAppender;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.Buffer;
015
016/**
017 * Appenders are guaranteed to be written synchronously much like an actor in actor
018 * concurrency.
019 *
020 * The only exception is if an Appender implements {@link ThreadSafeLogAppender}.
021 */
022public interface LogAppender extends LogLifecycle, LogEventConsumer, LogConfig.Provider<LogAppender> {
023
024        /**
025         * Default Console appender name.
026         */
027        static final String CONSOLE_APPENDER_NAME = "console";
028
029        /**
030         * Default output file appender name.
031         */
032        static final String FILE_APPENDER_NAME = "file";
033
034        /**
035         * Output appender property.
036         */
037        static final String APPENDER_OUTPUT_PROPERTY = LogProperties.APPENDER_OUTPUT_PROPERTY;
038
039        /**
040         * Encoder appender property.
041         */
042        static final String APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY = LogProperties.APPENDER_ENCODER_PROPERTY;
043
044        /**
045         * Batch of events. <strong>DO NOT MODIFY THE ARRAY</strong>. Do not use the
046         * <code>length</code> of the passed in array but instead use <code>count</code>
047         * parameter.
048         * @param events an array guaranteed to be smaller than count.
049         * @param count the number of items.
050         */
051        public void append(LogEvent[] events, int count);
052
053        @Override
054        public void append(LogEvent event);
055
056        @Override
057        default LogAppender provide(String name, LogConfig config) {
058                return this;
059        }
060
061        /**
062         * Creates a builder.
063         * @param name appender name.
064         * @return builder.
065         */
066        public static Builder builder(String name) {
067                return new Builder(name);
068        }
069
070        /**
071         * Creates a composite log appender from many. The appenders will be appended
072         * synchronously.
073         * @param appenders appenders.
074         * @return appender.
075         */
076        public static LogAppender of(List<? extends LogAppender> appenders) {
077                if (appenders.isEmpty()) {
078                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("A single appender is required");
079                }
080                if (appenders.size() == 1) {
081                        return Objects.requireNonNull(appenders.get(0));
082                }
083                @SuppressWarnings("null") // TODO Eclipse issue here
084                LogAppender @NonNull [] array = appenders.toArray(new LogAppender[] {});
085                return new CompositeLogAppender(array);
086        }
087
088        /**
089         * Finds an appender based on URI.
090         */
091        public interface AppenderProvider {
092
093                /**
094                 * Loads an appender from a URI.
095                 * @param uri uri.
096                 * @param name name of appender.
097                 * @param config config to access properties and other components like encoders.
098                 * @return appender.
099                 */
100                LogAppender provide(URI uri, String name, LogConfig config);
101
102        }
103
104        /**
105         * Builder for creating standard appenders.
106         * <p>
107         * If the output is not set standard out will be used. If the encoder is not set a
108         * default encoder will be resolved from the output.
109         */
110        public static final class Builder {
111
112                private LogConfig.@Nullable Provider<? extends LogOutput> output = null;
113
114                private LogConfig.@Nullable Provider<? extends LogEncoder> encoder = null;
115
116                private final String name;
117
118                private Builder(String name) {
119                        this.name = name;
120                }
121
122                /**
123                 * Name of the appender.
124                 * @return name.
125                 */
126                public String name() {
127                        return this.name;
128                }
129
130                /**
131                 * Sets output.
132                 * @param output output.
133                 * @return builder.
134                 */
135                public Builder output(LogConfig.Provider<? extends LogOutput> output) {
136                        this.output = output;
137                        return this;
138                }
139
140                /**
141                 * Sets output.
142                 * @param output output.
143                 * @return builder.
144                 */
145                public Builder output(LogOutput output) {
146                        this.output = LogConfig.Provider.of(output);
147                        return this;
148                }
149
150                /**
151                 * Sets formatter as encoder.
152                 * @param formatter formatter to be converted to encoder.
153                 * @return builder.
154                 * @see LogEncoder#of(LogFormatter)
155                 */
156                public Builder formatter(LogFormatter formatter) {
157                        this.encoder = LogConfig.Provider.of(LogEncoder.of(formatter));
158                        return this;
159                }
160
161                /**
162                 * Sets formatter as encoder.
163                 * @param formatter formatter to be converted to encoder.
164                 * @return builder.
165                 * @see LogEncoder#of(LogFormatter)
166                 */
167                public Builder formatter(LogFormatter.EventFormatter formatter) {
168                        this.encoder = LogConfig.Provider.of(LogEncoder.of(formatter));
169                        return this;
170                }
171
172                /**
173                 * Sets encoder.
174                 * @param encoder encoder not <code>null</code>.
175                 * @return builder.
176                 */
177                public Builder encoder(LogConfig.Provider<? extends LogEncoder> encoder) {
178                        this.encoder = encoder;
179                        return this;
180                }
181
182                /**
183                 * Sets encoder.
184                 * @param encoder encoder not <code>null</code>.
185                 * @return builder.
186                 */
187                public Builder encoder(LogEncoder encoder) {
188                        this.encoder = LogConfig.Provider.of(encoder);
189                        return this;
190                }
191
192                /**
193                 * Builds.
194                 * @return an appender factory.
195                 */
196                public LogConfig.Provider<LogAppender> build() {
197                        /*
198                         * We need to capture parameters since appender creation needs to be lazy.
199                         */
200                        var _name = name;
201                        var _output = output;
202                        var _encoder = encoder;
203                        /*
204                         * TODO should we use the parent name for resolution?
205                         */
206                        return (n, config) -> {
207                                AppenderConfig a = new AppenderConfig(_name, LogConfig.Provider.provideOrNull(_name, _output, config),
208                                                LogConfig.Provider.provideOrNull(_name, _encoder, config));
209                                return DefaultAppenderRegistry.appender(a, config);
210                        };
211                }
212
213        }
214
215        @Override
216        public void close();
217
218        /**
219         * An appender that can be used by a {@link LogPublisher.SyncLogPublisher}.
220         */
221        public interface ThreadSafeLogAppender extends LogAppender {
222
223                /**
224                 * Make an appender thread safe if is not already thread safe.
225                 * @param appender appender.
226                 * @return new thread safe appender if is not one or the passed in appender if it
227                 * thread safe.
228                 */
229                public static ThreadSafeLogAppender of(LogAppender appender) {
230                        if (appender instanceof ThreadSafeLogAppender lo) {
231                                return lo;
232                        }
233                        return DefaultLogAppender.threadSafeAppender.apply(appender);
234                }
235
236        }
237
238        /**
239         * An abstract appender to help create custom appenders.
240         */
241        abstract class AbstractLogAppender implements LogAppender {
242
243                /**
244                 * output
245                 */
246                protected final LogOutput output;
247
248                /**
249                 * encoder
250                 */
251                protected final LogEncoder encoder;
252
253                /**
254                 * Creates an appender from an output and encoder.
255                 * @param output set the output field and will be started and closed with the
256                 * appender.
257                 * @param encoder set the encoder field.
258                 */
259                protected AbstractLogAppender(LogOutput output, LogEncoder encoder) {
260                        super();
261                        this.output = output;
262                        this.encoder = encoder;
263                }
264
265                @Override
266                public void start(LogConfig config) {
267                        output.start(config);
268                }
269
270                @Override
271                public void close() {
272                        output.close();
273                }
274
275        }
276
277}
278
279record CompositeLogAppender(LogAppender[] appenders) implements LogAppender {
280
281        @Override
282        public void append(LogEvent[] event, int count) {
283                for (var appender : appenders) {
284                        appender.append(event, count);
285                }
286        }
287
288        @Override
289        public void append(LogEvent event) {
290                for (var appender : appenders) {
291                        appender.append(event);
292                }
293        }
294
295        @Override
296        public void close() {
297                for (var appender : appenders) {
298                        appender.close();
299                }
300        }
301
302        @Override
303        public void start(LogConfig config) {
304                for (var appender : appenders) {
305                        appender.start(config);
306                }
307        }
308
309}
310
311class LockingLogAppender implements ThreadSafeLogAppender {
312
313        private final LogAppender appender;
314
315        private final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
316
317        public LockingLogAppender(LogAppender appender) {
318                this.appender = appender;
319        }
320
321        @Override
322        public void append(LogEvent[] events, int count) {
323                lock.lock();
324                try {
325                        appender.append(events, count);
326                }
327                finally {
328                        lock.unlock();
329                }
330        }
331
332        @Override
333        public void append(LogEvent event) {
334                lock.lock();
335                try {
336                        appender.append(event);
337                }
338                finally {
339                        lock.unlock();
340                }
341
342        }
343
344        @Override
345        public void start(LogConfig config) {
346                appender.start(config);
347        }
348
349        @Override
350        public void close() {
351                appender.close();
352        }
353
354}
355
356/*
357 * The idea here is to have the virtual thread do the formatting outside of the lock
358 */
359class DefaultLogAppender extends AbstractLogAppender implements ThreadSafeLogAppender {
360
361        static Function<LogAppender, ThreadSafeLogAppender> threadSafeAppender = (appender) -> {
362                return new LockingLogAppender(appender);
363        };
364
365        protected final ReentrantLock lock = new ReentrantLock();
366
367        public DefaultLogAppender(LogOutput output, LogEncoder encoder) {
368                super(output, encoder);
369        }
370
371        @Override
372        public final void append(LogEvent event) {
373                try (var buffer = encoder.buffer()) {
374                        encoder.encode(event, buffer);
375                        lock.lock();
376                        try {
377                                output.write(event, buffer);
378                        }
379                        finally {
380                                lock.unlock();
381                        }
382                }
383        }
384
385        @Override
386        public void append(LogEvent[] events, int count) {
387                lock.lock();
388                try {
389                        output.write(events, count, encoder);
390                        output.flush();
391                }
392                finally {
393                        lock.unlock();
394                }
395        }
396
397        @Override
398        public void close() {
399                lock.lock();
400                try {
401                        super.close();
402                }
403                finally {
404                        lock.unlock();
405                }
406        }
407
408}
409
410class BufferLogAppender extends AbstractLogAppender {
411
412        private final Buffer buffer;
413
414        public BufferLogAppender(LogOutput output, LogEncoder encoder) {
415                super(output, encoder);
416                this.buffer = encoder.buffer();
417        }
418
419        @Override
420        public void append(LogEvent[] events, int count) {
421                buffer.clear();
422                output.write(events, count, encoder, buffer);
423                output.flush();
424        }
425
426        @Override
427        public void append(LogEvent event) {
428                buffer.clear();
429                output.write(event, buffer);
430                output.flush();
431        }
432
433}
